::SnowCat:;

She watched as Ratchet, Striker, Spears Andromeda and the other bot 
talked just outside the Ark.  She sat in the entrance way of the ark, 
listening and watching.  She could see the maximal symbols, but not 
having been intorduced, she stayed warry of them.   She saw two bots 
standing next to eachother.(Striker and Spears)  She smiled to 
herself.  She found it amazing how even in times of war,  something 
beautiful could still come to full bloom.  She straightened up and 
sat there, twitching her tail and watching.  She sniffed the air, 
something didn't smell quite right, but she couldn't put her finger 
on it.  She layed down and kept her head up, ears perked in the 
direction of the others.
